explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a blue short-sleeved T-shirt and red and black plaid pajama pants is standing next to a sofa, holding a remote control. The room has brown wooden floors, a glass door, and white walls.

[0-4] Then the man sits on the sofa and turns on the remote control with a smile. The camera switches to the TV screen, which shows an image of a creepy doll. Subsequently, the man's features protrude and transform into a horrifying image. Below the TV is a brown wooden TV stand with a black TV receiver on it.
